main event: A round, solid white object was observed flying very high and faded out after a brief sighting.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 20-30 seconds,The object was possibly aircraft but limited information was available,The sighting was reported under Project Blue Book,The object was described as round and white,Additional details included a possible red glow and a high altitude.
witness description: Prepared by Airdrome Officer Capt. Martin
